00018 namespace BulletHell.Game.Library.Behavior
00019 {
00020     /* Self Destruction is essentially chase behavior with a different condition */
00021     public class SelfDestructingBehavior : Behavior
00022     {
00023         private ChasingBehavior behavior;
00024         public SelfDestructingBehavior(EnemyPlaneObj parent)
00025             : base(parent)
00026         {
00027             behavior = new ChasingBehavior(parent);
00028             behaviorState = BehaviorState.SelfDestruct;
00029         }
00030 
00031         public override Behavior clone(EnemyPlaneObj newParent)
00032         {
00033             return new SelfDestructingBehavior(newParent);
00034         }
00035 
00036         internal override void Update(Map map, GameTime gameTime)
00037         {
00038             behavior.Update(map, gameTime);
00039         }
00040     }
00041 }
